root.name: ZenHak
root.description: ZenHak is a cyberpunk role-playing game that contains two mini games. A Haking mini game that is inspired by Craps and a conversation mini game inspired by Blackjack. Your avatar Atune starts the game with nothing but her Condo, computer, and haking skills. Start by Haking the Firewall then move on to the OptiCache and center bets, then you have to find a way to turn that data into creds.
